scripts.optimize-images: mkdir -p dist/images && (test -d images && test "$(ls -A images)" && sharp-cli --input images/* --output dist/images || echo 'No images to optimize')
scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-css: mkdir -p dist/css && postcss css/*.css --use cssnano --dir dist/css
